description: Detects exploitation attempts on Cisco ASA FTD systems exploiting CVE-2020-3452 with a status code of 200 (sccessful exploitation) Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Cisco ASA FTD Exploit CVE-2020-3452
query: (url.original:(*\+CSCOT\+\/translation\-table* OR *\+CSCOT\+\/oem\-customization*) AND url.original:(*&textdomain\=\/* OR *&textdomain\=%* OR *&name\=\/* OR *&name\=%*) AND http.response.status_code:"200")
